title: LF Plat/Diamond Top/Mid for Competitive LCS-style league
body:
CQR Gaming's newest team is joining a plat centered league, if you have ever wanted to join a team and have some fun in competitive League of Legends this is the team for you.

Please fill this out in the comments below and feel free to add me on League at GimpyTheFirst
Whats your op.gg?:
How many teams have you been a part of?:
What is your current rank and last seasons rank?:
Do you watch LCS? Who is your favourite team?:
Do you have discord? its a must.:

Alright thanks for taking the time to fill this out, like I said add me on League GimpyTheFirst, if you have any questions feel free to ask.

replies.body:
How many teams have you been a part of?:              Zero
What is your current rank and last seasons rank?:       Plat/Plat.  have reached diamond 5, though bad streak has dropped me again
Do you watch LCS? Who is your favourite team?:         sometimes, it can vary,  Fanatic?
Do you have discord? its a must.:         yes

Whats your op.gg?: http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=LeftyRaydy
How many teams have you been a part of?: 2
What is your current rank and last seasons rank?: Plat 2/3 and I did not play last season but Season 6 I was plat as well
Do you watch LCS? Who is your favourite team?: not really
Do you have discord? its a must.: yes
